ch0123_90_mizuki/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s do our best to shine as bright as the
sun and moon!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7101_0701_01_10:
My shining bond with Necrozma will
brighten up Pasio!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7101_0701_02_10: That’s my goal, at least—as a Neo Champion!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7101_0701_03_10:
My light will shine at full power! It’ll go
all the way to the moon!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7102_0701_01_10:
Heroes and Neo Champions are both the
kinds of people who get lots of attention!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7102_0701_02_10:
So now I need to be extra careful not to do
anything uncool... I gotta set an example!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7102_0701_03_10:
Guess I should start with the way I say hi!
NEO Alola!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7103_0701_01_10:
Being a Champion means I can show the
world how great Alolan Pokémon and
Trainers are!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7103_0701_03_10:
With me as a Neo Champion of Pasio, we
may be one step closer to making that
dream come true!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7104_0701_01_10:
Now’s our time! ♪ We fuse at dawn! ♪
Sync moves unleashed! ♪ Full power
we’ve gone! ♪
ch0123_90_mizuki/7104_0701_02_10:
Hehe. That’s a theme song I made for me
and Necrozma! What do you think?
Is it cool?
ch0123_90_mizuki/7105_0701_01_10: Welcome to the Neo Champions’ room!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7105_0701_02_10:
...Ah, I’m just practicing my greeting for
challengers!
ch0123_90_mizuki/7105_0701_03_10:
I hope I nail it when you come to challenge
me, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0123_90_mizuki/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, great timing! I wanted to give you this!
ch0123_90_mizuki/1701_0702_01_10:
Make sure you say “Alola” with a smile
when you come across a good item!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2501_0701_01_10:
In the future, I’d like to help Professor Kukui
promote Alola’s Pokémon League!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2501_0701_02_10:
That’s why I’ve been studying other regions’
leagues while I’m a Neo Champion on Pasio!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2501_0702_01_10:
When you visit Alola, you should take on the
Pokémon League there!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2501_0702_03_10:
Be sure to bundle up! Our league’s up on
Mount Lanakila—it’s REALLY cold up there!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2511_0701_01_10:
This outfit’s one of my favorites! It’s so loose
and breezy—just like the Alola region!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2511_0701_02_10:
It still has a really strong Neo Champion
feel to it too, though.
ch0123_90_mizuki/2511_0701_03_10:
I wanna be firm AND gentle, just like my
outfit!
ch0123_90_mizuki/2511_0702_01_10:
I want people to feel a bit of Alola when
they see me battle...
ch0123_90_mizuki/2511_0702_02_10:
I guess you could say that’s what I’m
aiming for as a Neo Champion!
ch0123_90_mizuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Did you know you can sometimes see the
moon in the morning?
ch0123_90_mizuki/3003_0701_01_10:
Alola! The sun’s high in the sky, so let’s head
out on a merry adventure!
ch0123_90_mizuki/3005_0701_01_10:
The moon’s up there in the night sky...
I hope I can go there with my Pokémon
someday!
